item.description:
We've biked The Washington Secondary path before. Consensus: the path is fine, and there's a great (and cheap) Mexican restaurant on the way back (Mr Taco's).

LET'S do both! We'll bike the path for about 15 miles, turn around and hit the restaurant on the way back.

This is a social bike ride - NOT a fast ride. We usually go at a 11-12 mph pace. I'd like to increase it to 14 this time (I'll slow down if people find it too fast).

We'll meet right in front of the Lowes parking lot and start biking. Can't find me? Make sure to take my cell # with you!

NOTE: I'm planning this one far in advance, so the usual caveats about bad weather or schedule changes apply.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red car and a red bike - Try my cell: 401-699-7304
item.name: BIKING Washington Secondary + Mr Taco ~30 miles
